meanings.definition: A concise summary of a text or speech.
meanings.sent1: I always write a precis after reading a long article.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to write a precis of the chapter for homework.
meanings.sent3: The precis of the story was so short, it fit on a sticky note!
meanings.sent4: Her precis of the novel captured the essence of the plot in just a few sentences.
meanings.sent5: The precis of the speech made it easy to understand the main points.

meanings.definition: To make a concise summary of a text or speech.
meanings.sent1: She will precis the article for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: Can you precis this paragraph into a few sentences?
meanings.sent3: He tried to precis the movie plot, but ended up telling the whole story.
meanings.sent4: I need to precis this report before the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The student learned how to precis long passages for better understanding.
